title: Did Fawsi Trump warn in 2017 that the "surprise outbreak" was coming?
subtitle: Dr. Anthony Fawsi has led the National Institute for International Development for more than three decades and has advised five United States Presidents on global health threats.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: In January 2017, the Director of the Institute, Dr. Anthony Fosse, warned that the Trump administration would face a sudden outbreak of infectious diseases.
